entry.title: Lets Start this up
entry.content:
Well lets try this again. I remember starting an octopress blog well over a year ago. A lot has changed since then. Back then I was at working for Snapfish building out a new IOS application and service, seconded to Pivotal Labs to learn XP and basis for running good agile products. Now I work for Samsung Research America, working mostly in Android and Rails with a smattering of other stuff.

Quite a journey but perhaps one where I have learned as much as I possibly could about state of the art software systems development and deployment.

WIth this blog (which I will try to keep updated) I will hopefully discuss some useful and interesting things related to my craft
